content: बलिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बलमस्त्यस्य इनि] {@--1@} Strong, powerful, mighty; <ls>R. 16. 37</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 174.</ls> {@--2@} Stout, robust. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A buffalo. {@--2@} A hog. {@--3@} A camel. {@--4@} A bull. {@--5@} A soldier. {@--6@} A kind of jasmine. {@--7@} The phlegmatic humour. {@--8@} An epithet of Balarāma.
